item.description:
Desi BOAT CRUISE PARTY

Generation Desi invites you to the biggest Desi party of the summer where you can enjoy great music from Indian DJ’s while enjoying the stunning city views during a cruise around Boston Harbor.

EVENT: Netsap Boston Cruise
DATE: Friday July 23rd

TIME: 10PM – 2AM
COST: $20 for Netsap members
$25 for non Netsap members
*dont know what the last minute ticket price is*

Boarding location is 60 Rowes Wharf in Boston – Please be on time

There will be 3 floors of fun, dance, music and Boston views. Multiple DJ’s in different rooms will be playing the best Bhangra, Bollywood and International Desi Hits.

Join us to meet new people, reconnect with friends and be social while cruising around Boston on a nice summer night. This event will sell out and we expect over 300 people to attend!


Limited tickets are available for this event and they will be sold on a first come first serve basis.
